You have no cards! Add one to get started.

Welcome to TiddlyWiki!

This is a system for organizing information in your own way, no matter how complicated

With TiddlyWiki, you get the following benefits:

  • Portable. You can export this entire site, including your data, into a self-contained HTML file and open it on any browser

  • Compatible. It works across all platforms. any browser will open it

  • It's Free. You don't need to purchase anything or pay a fee to use it.

What do I need to know to started?

What you write in your cards will be in what is called wikitext, which gives you a number of benefits:

  • Quick linking. Though TiddlyWiki acts more like a note-taking application, you get the benefit of Wikis too. This includes the ability to quickly create pages. Typing

  • Quick formatting. By typing in special symbols, you can specify the formatting of the contents of your Tiddlers. See the reference guide for more information.
